GMAT Prep — Self-Paced

Prep at your speed, on your schedule.

Watch Kaplan’s top teachers walk you through the strategies and concepts you need to tackle every topic on the GMAT.

The GMAT Channel available with Self-Paced PLUS From fundamentals review to advanced sessions on the most difficult GMAT topics, the GMAT Channel offers interactive lessons and one-on-one help from our highest-rated GMAT experts. Catch it streaming live or watch it on demand.


Official Test Day Experience

A simulated GMAT® at an actual testing center—only with Kaplan. When you know what to expect on the day of the actual exam, you eliminate the element of surprise—and that will boost your confidence. With this Kaplan Exclusive, you can:

  • take a full practice exam at the same center where you’ll sit for the real GMAT
  • know when to leave the house so you arrive 30 minutes before the test
  • learn what to bring (ID) and what to leave at home (phone, watch, notes)
  • go through check-in, security, and everything you'll encounter on Test Day
